basics.name: Haiyun Deng
basics.label: Ph.D. in Computer Science
basics.summary: A Ph.D. student in Computer Science at Florida International University, specializing in cybersecurity, machine learning, and blockchain technology.

work.name: Florida International University
work.summary: Conducting research on security and privacy vulnerabilities across Android devices, mHealth applications, and blockchain platforms.
highlights: Analyzed update delays and their impact on security across Android devices.
Built a Seq2Seq model using RNNs and LSTMs for early phishing detection.
Proposed adaptive security solutions for DeFi platforms.

work.name: Florida International University

highlights: Developed course materials for Computer Architecture, IoT Security, and Privacy.
Led lab sessions and offered individual student support.
